title: Reuters reveals U.S. finds new quality problems at Lilly drug factory
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters was first to report U.S. drug inspectors recently recorded several new quality-control problems at an Eli Lilly and Co […]

The post Reuters reveals U.S. finds new quality problems at Lilly drug factory appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report U.S. drug inspectors recently recorded several new quality-control problems at an Eli Lilly and Co plant that is already the subject of a federal investigation over manufacturing lapses, according to a government report reviewed by Reuters.

The post Reuters reveals U.S. finds new quality problems at Lilly drug factory appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
